title: New Releases for March 1, 2016
description:
This week, Liberty and Rebecca discuss Black Apple, The Art of Risk, Don’t Let My Baby Do Rodeo, and more new releases.
This episode was sponsored by FabFitFun and Viceland, a new channel from Vice, launching February 29.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or iTunes and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
For a complete list of books discussed in this episode, visit our website.

Books discussed on the show:
Don’t Let My Baby Do Rodeo by Boris Fishman
The Art of Risk: The New Science of Courage, Caution, and Chance by Kayt Sukel
The Passenger by Lisa Lutz
The Turner House by Angela Flournoy
Evicted: Poverty and Profit in the American City by Matthew Desmond
Welcome Thieves: Stories by Sean Beaudoin
Black Apple by Joan Crate
Blackass by A. Igoni Barrett

What we’re reading:
Piece of Mind by Michelle Adelman
The Inseparables by Stuart Nadler
Girls & Sex: Navigating the Complicated New Landscape by Peggy Orenstein
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
